author: benh
msg: Added an autoconf option to conditionally use libcurl (disabled by default) and made a few semantics changes to 'download' (contributed by Florian Leibert).

author: benh
msg: Made sure the slave sends status updates for tasks launched via a CommandInfo and updated Task to make 'executor_id' optional for the cases when a task was launched with a CommandInfo (w/ corresponding changes in the master and slave).

author: arist
msg: update RAT excludes to include files with known licenses

author: bodewig
msg: add support for file name encoding in tar archives
